content:
# Script Name: connectionv7.conf
# 
# Description: 
# Connection Script file for Inter-Cloud Data Transfer Task
# 
#
# 09.03.2022   Version 1   Initial Version requires UA 7.2
# 09.03.2022   Version 2   SFTP support
# 27.04.2022   Version 3   Azure target mistake corrected
# 13.05.2022   Version 4   Copy_Url added
# 31.05.2022   Version 5   client_id and secret added for onedrive
# 17.06.2022   Version 6   azure service principal connection added
# 28.06.2022   Version 7   aws named profile
# 18.10.2022   Version 8   SharePoint with APP ID

#

[remote_box]
type = box
client_id = ${_credentialUser('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_storage_credentials}')}
client_secret = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_storage_credentials}')}
token = ${_credentialToken('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_storage_credentials}')}

[remote_box_source]
type = box
client_id = ${_credentialUser('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_source_credentials}')}
client_secret = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_source_credentials}')}
token = ${_credentialToken('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_source_credentials}')}


[remote_box_target]
type = box
client_id = ${_credentialUser('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_target_credentials}')}
client_secret = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_target_credentials}')}
token = ${_credentialToken('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_target_credentials}')}



[amazon_s3_telemetrytesting_source]
type = s3
provider = AWS
env_auth = false
access_key_id = ${_credentialUser('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_source_credentials}')}
secret_access_key = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_source_credentials}')}
region = us-east-1


[amazon_s3_telemetrytesting_target]
type = s3
provider = AWS
env_auth = false
access_key_id = ${_credentialUser('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_target_credentials}')}
secret_access_key = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_target_credentials}')}
region = us-east-1




[microsoft_azure_blob_storage_target_telemetry]
type = azureblob
account = ${_credentialUser('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_target_credentials}')}
key = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_target_credentials}')}


[microsoft_azure_blob_storage_source_telemetry]
type = azureblob
account = ${_credentialUser('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_source_credentials}')}
key = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_ue_cloud_dt_source_credentials}')}


[amazon_s3_target]
type = s3
provider = AWS
env_auth = false
access_key_id = ${_credentialUser('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}
secret_access_key = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}
region = ${_credentialKeyLoc('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}
acl = bucket-owner-full-control


[amazon_s3_source]
type = s3
provider = AWS
env_auth = false
access_key_id = ${_credentialUser('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}
secret_access_key = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}
region = ${_credentialKeyLoc('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}
acl = bucket-owner-full-control


[amazon_s3_source_named_profile]
type = s3
provider = AWS
env_auth = true
region = eu-central-1
acl = bucket-owner-full-control


[amazon_s3_target_named_profile]
type = s3
provider = AWS
env_auth = true
region = eu-central-1
acl = bucket-owner-full-control


[microsoft_azure_blob_storage_sas_source]
type = azureblob
sas_url = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}


[microsoft_azure_blob_storage_sas_target]
type = azureblob
sas_url = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}


[microsoft_azure_blob_storage_source]
type = azureblob
account = ${_credentialUser('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}
key = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}


[microsoft_azure_blob_storage_target]
type = azureblob
account = ${_credentialUser('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}
key = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}


[microsoft_azure_blob_storage_sp_source]
type = azureblob
account = ${_credentialUser('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}
service_principal_file = ${_scriptPath('azure-principal.json')} 
# service_principal_file = C:\virtual_machines\Setup\SoftwareKeys\Azure\azure-principal.json


[microsoft_azure_blob_storage_sp_target]
type = azureblob
account = ${_credentialUser('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}
service_principal_file = ${_scriptPath('azure-principal.json')} 
# service_principal_file = C:\virtual_machines\Setup\SoftwareKeys\Azure\azure-principal.json


[datalakegen2_storage_source]
type = azureblob
account = ${_credentialUser('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}
key = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}


[datalakegen2_storage_target]
type = azureblob
account = ${_credentialUser('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}
key = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}


[datalakegen2_storage_sp_source]
type = azureblob
account = ${_credentialUser('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}
service_principal_file = ${_scriptPath('azure-principal.json')} 
# service_principal_file = C:\virtual_machines\Setup\SoftwareKeys\Azure\azure-principal.json


[datalakegen2_storage_sp_target]
type = azureblob
account = ${_credentialUser('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}
service_principal_file = ${_scriptPath('azure-principal.json')} 
# service_principal_file = C:\virtual_machines\Setup\SoftwareKeys\Azure\azure-principal.json


[google_cloud_storage_source]
type = google cloud storage
service_account_file = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}
object_acl = bucketOwnerFullControl
project_number = clagcs
location = europe-west3


[google_cloud_storage_target]
type = google cloud storage
service_account_file = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}
object_acl = bucketOwnerFullControl
project_number = clagcs
location = europe-west3


[onedrive_source]
type = onedrive
token = ${_credentialToken('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}
drive_id = ${_credentialUser('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}
drive_type = business
#client_id = c525de98-42b6-4d76-a0a0-5b38b61bfceb
client_secret = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}
update_credential = token


[onedrive_target]
type = onedrive
token = ${_credentialToken('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}
drive_id = ${_credentialUser('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}
drive_type = business
#client_id = c525de98-42b6-4d76-a0a0-5b38b61bfceb
client_secret = ${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}
update_credential = token


[hdfs_source]
type = hdfs
namenode = 172.18.0.2:8020
username = maria_dev


[hdfs_target]
type = hdfs
namenode = 172.18.0.2:8020
username = maria_dev


[linux_source]
type = local


[linux_target]
type = local


[windows_source]
type = local


[windows_target]
type = local


[sftp_source]
type = sftp
host = 3.144.145.215
user = ubuntu
pass = ${_credentialToken('${ops_var_source_credential}${ops_var_source_credential_variable}')}



[sftp_target]
type = sftp
host = 3.144.145.215
user = ubuntu
pass = ${_credentialToken('${ops_var_target_credential}${ops_var_target_credential_variable}')}

[intercloud_target]
type = local
host = 3.144.145.215
user = itcuser


[copy_url]
